name: Seal The Deal (Sfunk92)
description:
WebGL (in-browser  version) can be found here. There is no difference between the submitted downloaded version and this webgl version. If you are worried that this is not fair, then please play the downloadable version. Thank you:

https://snootysnootgames.itch.io/can-you-haggle

Try to wheel and deal against the best in the biz so you can refurnish your apartment. Can you haggle them down so you can pay less for more stuff! 

Credits:

Edie Evans -Music/SFX - https://soundcloud.com/edieevanss

Shiyi Yin - Artist Lead - @S_ionYlla

Seb Boulton - SFX - @zensor_music

Seth Funk - Team Lead/ Programmer/Voice Acting - @SethFunk4

Use of NCS song for SEAL the DEAL minigame

Track: Lost Sky - Need You [NCS Release]
Music provided by NoCopyrightSounds.
Watch:
